title: Base Virtual Machine Type
description: Base type for all virtual machine definitions across different virtualization platforms.

type.description: GTS identifier of the VM type

id.description: Unique identifier of the VM instance

name.description: Human-readable name of the virtual machine

cpuCores.description: Number of virtual CPU cores allocated to the VM

powerState.description: Current power state of the virtual machine. Reference to gts.x.infra.compute.vm_state.v1~ type.

osType.description: Operating system type running on the VM

createdAt.description: Timestamp when the VM was created

environment.description: Environment where the VM is deployed.

owner.description: Owner of the VM (team, user, or service account)
